pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider OOO (2010, TV show)$(br2)Used by OOO's $(l:ooo/riders/ooo#latorartar)Latorartar Combo$(/l)

Obtained by right-clicking the $(l:ooo/arsenal/ridevendor)Ridevendor$(/l) with a $(l:ooo/arsenal/candroids#tora_candroid)Tora Candroid$(/l)$(br2)Right-click while sneaking to change back into the $(l:ooo/arsenal/ridevendor)Ridevendor$(/l)
